# fastapi-aws-auth-29146

AWS configuration utilities for Python applications.

## Installation

```bash
pip install fastapi-aws-auth-29146
```

## Usage

```python
from fastapi_aws_auth_29146 import get_config, get_client

# Get AWS configuration
config = get_config()

# Get S3 client
s3 = get_client('s3')
```
